part_description: Three evenly stacked drawers with handles, rectangular shape, positioned vertically within the cabinet frame.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out of the cabinet frame, guided by tracks on the sides. Each drawer has a handle for easy pulling, and they are designed to fit snugly within the frame to maximize storage space and maintain alignment.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a desk. Users interact by pulling the handles to access contents. It can hold various items, providing organized storage in offices or homes. The flat top can support additional items or decor.
